# Dictionary definitions of words seen in class

```{r flashtable, echo=FALSE, results='asis', message = FALSE, warning=FALSE }
  images <- list.files(".",pattern = "jpg|png")
  numbers <- seq(1:length(images))
  meanings <- strsplit(images,"[.]")
  meanings <- sapply(meanings,"[[",1)
  meanings <- gsub("-"," ",meanings)
  links <- sapply(images, function (x) getmedialink(x, 5))
  imgquestions = sprintf("Image %s",seq(1:length(images)))
  df3 <- data.frame(links, meanings, row.names = NULL )
  colnames(df3) <- c("Images", "Expressions")

if (knitr::is_latex_output()) {
  knitr::kable(df3, "latex", booktabs = T, longtable = T) %>%
    #     collapse_rows(columns = 1:2, valign = "top",latex_hline = "none") %>%
    kable_styling(latex_options = c("scale_down","striped"),position = "center")

} else if (knitr::is_html_output()) {
  knitr::kable(df3,  captions=NULL) %>%
    kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed", "responsive"))
    #     collapse_rows(columns = 1:2, valign = "top")

}
```
